text: Pakpattan Railway Station (, ) is located in District Pakpattan, Punjab, Pakistan. ==Route== This Railway Station is situated on Kasur, Vehari and Lodhran Railway Track. Other Railway facilities are Locomotive shed, Railway Hospital, Turntable (railroad). Fareed Express is only express train running on this track. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Pakpattan District Category:Railway stations on Lodhran–Raiwind Line
title: Pakpattan railway station
